title: Post Count
content:
Yea,

I thought it was kinda neat before the update you could see how many posts you, and others, had well, posted. And what your status was. Is that coming back, if not, how can i find the post count? Dunno.
author: Eric_West

_( Because I have not posted 101 posts on the new Typophile 2.0 already, or have I.? :)_

The Prolific Posters looks to see who’s been most active in the last 30 days, so that’s what you’re seeing.

We do want to bring back the post numbers, and the user ranks. All this stuff is in the works. We just didn’t want to hold up the launch to get those in.
